page.title: 20Western By-Pass
page.content: every house. Exhibitions were held where plans and models were shown. They say 97% of those who replied were in favour. People whose house has to be demolished have their house bought by the government. Those near will get Double Glazing fitted. Some residents, however, are still worried about noise, pollution and accidents. Scientists are to monitor these problems. The new By-Pass will be specially designed to carry heavy traffic. Footbridges and Subways will be built at the new Denton Square roundabout. The new road will pass beneath the present West Road at Denton Square. There will be four lanes of traffic. The cost of the new Government financed road is expected to be Â£63,000,000 and it is due to be completed in 1989.
